animeDescription: Calysia and Ylion are very close siblings. One day, Calysia was kidnapped because their father tried to catch a unicorn. After 10 years Ylion grew up and trained as a warrior. He left to go to the hanging garden where unicorns live with a sword that was made from a unicorn's horn.  (Source: ShortShorts)
animeStaff: [['Nakamura Takashi', ['Director', 'Script', 'Storyboard']], ['Kasamatsu Kouji', ['Sound Director']], ['Nakauchi Terumi', ['Color Design']], ['Murata Mitsunori', ['Assistant Director']]]
